alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Bent County Including Las Animas; Crowley County Including Ordway; Kiowa County Including Eads; Prowers County Including Lamar; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 22 at 2:57PM MDT until March 22 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning remains in effect for portions of the southeast plains this afternoon through this evening. ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued for the southern I-25 corridor tomorrow afternoon. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 227, 231, 234, 235, 236, AND 237... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 227, 231, 234, 235, 236 and 237. * Winds...Southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent. * Impacts...Blowing dust could dramatically reduce visibility. Any fire that starts will rapidly spread. If you smell smoke, report it to local authorities.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Bent County Including Las Animas; Crowley County Including Ordway; Kiowa County Including Eads; Prowers County Including Lamar; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs
